column1: Uchi////We were let in exactly at 5 and were seated at the "community table" where they serve the social hour.  Well
column2: me and my friends being the adventurous eaters that we are decided to order all of the items off the social hour menu so we could sample each thing.  I honestly could not tell you the name of everything I ate but I know a couple of items that stuck out.  The pork belly with some kind of egg sauce
column4: some eggplant on nigiri rice were some of my favorites.  But every item I ate was truly packed with intense flavors which surprised me.
